# <a name="organizing-your-outlookcom-mailbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="acda2-102">组织您的 Outlook.com 邮箱</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-102">Organizing your Outlook.com mailbox</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="acda2-103">联系人列表是电子邮件地址的集合, 可用于向一组人发送电子邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-103">A contact list is a collection of email addresses, and is useful for sending email to a group of people.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="acda2-104">创建联系人列表:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-104">To create a contact list:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="acda2-105">转到[人员](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-105">Go to [People](https://outlook.live.com/people/)</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="acda2-106">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-106"></span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="acda2-107">在页面顶部, 选择箭头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-107">At the top of the page, select the arrow</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="acda2-108">在 "**新建联系人**" 旁边, 选择 "**新建联系人列表**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-108">next to **New contact** and then select **New contact list**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="acda2-109">输入列表的名称, 然后添加名称或电子邮件地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-109">Enter a name for the list, and then add names or email addresses.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="acda2-110">选择“创建”\*\*\*\*。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-110">Select **Create**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="acda2-111">了解有关如何[在 Outlook.com 中创建、查看和编辑联系人和联系人列表的](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)详细信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="acda2-111">Learn more about how to [create, view, and edit contacts and contact lists in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/5b909158-036e-4820-92f7-2a27f57b9f01?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
